entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT , Smithers
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:24 PM PDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -3.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Smithers Airport 04:00 AM PDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

Temperature: -3.1°C

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 94 %
